info.title: PayKidz (Child Support) API Specifications
info.description: This API is used to create orders for child support IVR payment processing.

post.description: This method is used to initiate child support payments via our payment processing service. It will accept a payment request that contains the type of payment, payment amount and any other identifying data. A new payment transaction will be initiated in the system with a unique Order Id. The method will return the Order Id.

identityTypeId.description: Valid values: 1=SSN, 2=Passport, 4=Alien Registration Number for Identity One; 0=Other, 3=Driverâ€™s License for Identity Two

firstName.description: First Name of the customer making the payment. Optional.

lastName.description: Last Name of the customer making the payment. Optional.

middleName.description: Middle Name of the customer making the payment. Optional.

phone.description: Phone number of the customer making the payment. Optional.

email.description: Email of the customer making the payment. Optional.

orderId.description: A unique identifier for the payment transaction. It is generated by Civitek and returned to the partner who initiated the payment.

status.description: Indicates the success or failure in initiating a payment transaction and creating the OrderId.

errorMessage.description: Text describing the error returned if payment transaction could not be initiated. This will be null if the status is success.

amount.description: Child support payment amount received in the IVR Request.

feeAmount.description: Amount charged as a fee for processing the payment.

totalAmount.description: Total amount charged for the payment, including the child support payment amount and fee amount.

caseNumber.description: Case number (Identifier) for the case for which the child support payment is being made. It is passed in the IVR Request.

bearerAuth.description: Please provide the JWT token. For login information, please contact support.
